metadata.title: MUBVIEW Wireless Doorbell Camera with Chime, WiFi Video Doorbell Camera with Motion Detector, Anti-Theft Device, 1080P HD, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Storage (Optional)
features: 【Rechargeable Battery & Stable Connection】MUBVIEW wireless doorbell camera with built-in battery and low power consumption, long-lasting power per charge. Video doorbell works great with 2.4Ghz WiFi. Up and running in minutes.

【Smarter Human Detection & Instant Message Alerts】With PIR motion and human detection enabled, once human activity detected and notifies you in seconds . Doorbell camera can reduce false alarms caused by plants, animals, or small insects.

【Two-way Audio & Voice Message】Safely see and speak to delivery people from inside your home. The doorbell camera sound is perfectly synched up with the video and it's much clearer. Or a pre-recorded 10S voice message to quickly respond no matter where you are.

【1080P Full HD & IR Night Vision】Doorbell camera presents you a 1080P full HD video with 145° wider view. With starlight CMOS image sensor, this security doorbell camera will let you enjoy industry-leading video clarity and super night vision up to 33ft, taking the advanced night vision experience to you.
【Privacy Protection & Truly Risk-free Purchase】Every moment captured is stored via advanced encryption. LIFETIME SERVICE ensures this will quickly become your favorite no-risk purchase.
description: We designed this motion-activated doorbell camera for anyone that wants to maintain their safety.
Enjoy 90-day of surveillance from just one charge. Recharge with ease so you always know who’s at your door.
See visitors in sharp detail as they approach your door against any backlighting.
Speak directly to anyone who approaches your front door via two-way audio. Tell your friends that you have just run out to get some milk.
Military-grade AES-256 data encryption ensures your footage is kept private on transmission and storage.
Ensures non-stop operation in extreme temperatures from -4°F to 122° F (-20°C to 50°C)
This wireless doorbell camera takes less than 5 minutes to set up without having to use any complicated tools.

It’s easy to install, compact and comes with everything you need to get it up and running in a matter of minutes without relying on any tools or professional help. Make the home security doorbell to maintain the safety of your home with our 1080p video doorbell camera.
